mods.li: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Abyssal

value.description: The gun of an automated lance.
The gun of an automated lance.
The gun of an automated lance.

A highly advanced automatic turret that uses a Abyssal Lance as its weapon of choice. Fires very slowly. Must be reloaded occasionally, one charge cell at a time\n\nJust like the Abyssal Lance, the turret excels at extremely close and long range, but is highly inconsistent at further ranges.

A highly advanced automatic turret that uses a Abyssal Lance as its weapon of choice. Fires very slowly. Must be reloaded occasionally, one charge cell at a time

Just like the Abyssal Lance, the turret excels at extremely close and long range, but is highly inconsistent at further ranges.

This specific varient has five times the fuel capacity as the standard variant and isn't as well armored.
The gun of an automated lance.

A highly advanced automatic turret that uses a Abyssal Lance as its weapon of choice. Fires somewhat slowly. Must be reloaded occasionally, one charge cell at a time

Just like the Abyssal Lance, the turret excels at extremely close and long range, but is highly inconsistent at further ranges.

This specific varient has five times the fuel capacity as the standard variant and isn't as well armored.

A highly advanced automatic turret that uses an Abyssal Lance as its weapon of choice. Fires somewhat slowly. Must be reloaded occasionally, one charge cell at a time

Just like the Abyssal Lance, the turret excels at extremely close and long range, but is highly inconsistent at further ranges.

This specific varient has five times the fuel capacity as the standard variant and isn't as well armored.

This specific varient has five times the fuel capacity as the standard variant and isn't as well armored.
The gun of an eternal automated lance.

A highly advanced automatic turret that uses n Abyssal Lance as its weapon of choice. Fires at a decent rate (blazing for the likes of Abyssal Lances). Must be reloaded occasionally, one charge cell at a time. It unleashes a burst of two projectiles each time it fires.\n\nJust like the Abyssal Lance, the turret excels at extremely close and long range, but is highly inconsistent at further ranges.
The gun of an enigmatic lance.

A highly volatile turret that uses a Abyssal Lance supercharged with enigmatic energy as its weapon of choice. While it takes a while to charge, it makes up for the wait by unleashing a violent volley of low-energy Eternal Fabric projectiles that are on-par with the Abyssal Lance.

While the turret won't explode, the danger of the turret still lies in its ability to lay waste to whatever lies in its path. It has to be loaded one cell at a time.

Just like the Abyssal Lance, the turret excels at extremely close and long range, but is highly inconsistent at medium ranges.
